Dify AI Complete Guide 2026

The Open-Source LLMOps Platform for Building AI Agents

What is Dify AI?

Dify AI is an open-source LLMOps platform that enables you to build, deploy, and manage AI agent applications with visual orchestration workflows. It combines the simplicity of drag-and-drop interfaces with the power of advanced AI capabilities, making it ideal for both beginners and experienced developers.

Core Features

  • Visual Workflow Builder: Create complex AI agents without coding
  • RAG Engine: Built-in retrieval-augmented generation capabilities
  • Agent Capabilities: Build autonomous agents with tool use
  • Model Support: Works with GPT-4, Claude, Llama, and 50+ other models
  • API Management: Built-in API server and documentation
  • Observability: Monitor and debug your AI applications
  • Self-Hosted: Deploy on your own infrastructure

Key Components

Chatbot Assistant

Build conversational AI assistants with memory and context

Workflow

Create complex multi-step AI processes visually

Agent

Autonomous agents that can use tools and reasoning

Knowledge Base

Upload documents for RAG-powered responses

Pricing

Cloud Version: Free tier with 200 credits/month

Pro: $29/month for enhanced features

Team: $99/month for collaboration features

Self-Hosted: Free and open-source (Docker deployment)
